## Galaxy, Tripal Galaxy and Computational Analysis

[Galaxy](https://usegalaxy.org/) is an open, web-based platform for reproducible computational analysis. Tripal Galaxy is a [Tripal](http://tripal.info) module that allows Tripal site users to interact with Galaxy from within a Tripal site.
